meanings.definition: relating to the interaction of aerodynamic forces and structural flexibility
meanings.sent1: The aeroelastic wings of the plane bend slightly during flight.
meanings.sent2: The aeroelastic properties of the bridge allow it to withstand strong winds.
meanings.sent3: The aeroelastic fabric of the kite made it dance gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her aeroelastic mind adapted easily to changing circumstances.
meanings.sent5: The aeroelastic branches of the tree swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: a structure or material that exhibits aeroelastic behavior
meanings.sent1: The airplane's wing is an aeroelastic that responds to air pressure.
meanings.sent2: The aeroelastic was carefully designed to ensure stability during flight.
meanings.sent3: The aeroelastic in the wind tunnel seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The bridge's aeroelastic allowed it to flex without breaking under stress.
meanings.sent5: The aeroelastic of the building made it resilient to strong winds.
